name: Order Tracker Google Sheet
description: An end-to-end order tracking system built in Google Sheets, empowering small businesses and creators to stay on top of every order, status, and timeline. With a dynamic dashboard and intuitive filtering, it’s your command center for order and finance clarity.

sections.title: Track Every Order
sections.text: Add and update orders in a structured format with fields for order ID, customer, items, assignee, timeline, and payment details. The sheet adapts to your workflow and makes status management effortless.
sections.htmlText: Add and update orders in a structured format with fields for order ID, customer, items, assignee, timeline, and payment details. The sheet adapts to your workflow and makes status management effortless.

sections.title: Live Dashboard Overview
sections.text: View real-time metrics including order volume, payment received, pending deliveries, and turnaround performance. Dynamic charts help you visualize key KPIs instantly.
sections.htmlText: View real-time metrics including order volume, payment received, pending deliveries, and turnaround performance. Dynamic charts help you visualize key KPIs instantly.

sections.title: Assignee-Based Analysis
sections.text: Assign orders to team members and sort them by assignee for better delegation. Stay organized and accountable across all stakeholders.
sections.htmlText: Assign orders to team members and sort them by assignee for better delegation. Stay organized and accountable across all stakeholders.

sections.title: Timeline and Due Tracking
sections.text: See your delivery timelines on a visual scale—never miss a deadline again. You can filter by week, month, or urgent orders to stay proactive.
sections.htmlText: See your delivery timelines on a visual scale—never miss a deadline again. You can filter by week, month, or urgent orders to stay proactive.

sections.title: Financial Summary at a Glance
sections.text: Understand your order income, outstanding payments, and historical sales trends—clearly displayed through the financial dashboard section.
